headline: Former Journalist’s Current Role: News Media Critic for the Sanders Campaign
abstract: David Sirota’s job is to remind the candidate’s supporters why he dislikes the news media.
lead_paragraph: When the first in-house newsletter of Bernie Sanders’s campaign landed in inboxes last August, its chief antagonist was neither President Trump nor a rival for the Democratic presidential nomination, but rather The Washington Post and, as the email said, “the Washington pundits who are paid by the corporations and billionaires who own the media.”
